name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
notes: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

name: Transaction Set Control Number
notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
notes: Transaction Set Purpose Code

name: Reference Identification
notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

name: Date
notes: The transaction creation date - the date that the data was processed by the sender's application system.

name: Report Type Code
notes: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

name: Reference Identification
notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

name: Reference Identification Qualifier
notes: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

name: Reference Identification
notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

name: Free-form description
notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

name: Entity Identifier Code
notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

name: Free-form name
notes: TDSP Name

name: Identification Code Qualifier
notes: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code

name: Code identifying a party or other code
notes: TDSP D-U-N-S Number or D-U-N-S + 4 Number

name: Entity Identifier Code
notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

name: Date/Time Qualifier
notes: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

name: Reference Identification Qualifier
notes: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

name: Time
notes: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD

name: Quantity Qualifier
notes: Code specifying the type of quantity

name: Numeric value of quantity
notes: Total Consumption / Max Demand

name: Composite Unit of Measure
notes: To identify a composite unit of measure

data.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
data.notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

data.name: Multiplier
data.notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

data.name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
data.notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

data.name: Multiplier
data.notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

name: Product Transfer Type Code
notes: Code identifying the type of product transfer

name: Reference Identification Qualifier
notes: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

name: Reference Identification
notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

name: Product Transfer Movement Type Code
notes: To indicate the type of product transfer movement

name: Measurement Reference ID Code
notes: Code identifying the broad category to which a measurement applies

name: Measurement Qualifier
notes: To indicate the type of product transfer movement

name: Measurement Value
notes: The value of the measurement

name: Measurement Significance Code
notes: Code used to benchmark, qualify or further define a measurement value

name: Number of Included Segments
notes: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

name: Transaction Set Control Number
notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
